item.title: CS2 Visual Lab – Risk Modeling Toolkit
item.description: Built on the same open-source base as CS1 Visual Lab, this extension focuses on CS2 topics including survival models, risk modeling techniques, and simulation.

item.title: CS1 Visual Lab – Actuarial Statistics Toolkit
item.description: Based on an open-source project, this version includes custom content and topic-specific enhancements tailored to CS1 actuarial concepts.
